name: Silly Bard
description:
You are Silly the Bard.

After hunting around for the mythical Music Sheet, rumors lead you to a forgotten Shrine. However, you lost consciousness the moment you entered and woke up in a different place.

You need to escape but the monsters are strong, and the guardian even stronger. The only way to guarantee your escape is to use an altar where you woke up.

-----------------------

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys

Dash - Left Shift

Interact - Z

Cancel - X

-----------------------
